attributes.action: If England win Euro 2021, we want Gareth Southgate on the £20 note
attributes.additional_details: Because Gareth would become an national hero, leading our great nation to European history
attributes.background: We want Gareth Southgate to be the face of the £20 note if England win the Euro's. The reason we believe the £20 note is most fitting is because of it being Euro 2020

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here:
https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/banknote-characters
